Posts.Content: beachblonde wrote: o i was diagnosed 2 days ago my question is how do i tell my 12 year old daughter shes going to take this so hard as we are already going thru this with my husband he has stage 4 colon cancer and has been on chemo for 3 years now i have to tell her i have cancer too this is gonna be so hard to tell her any advice please just breaks my heart to have to tell her Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: how do i tell my 12 year old daughter beachblonde
